name: My Shadow
description:
The Mind can sometimes be too imaginative. While you tuck yourself into your bed and turn the lights off, the creatures of the night begin to appear. As you hide under your bedsheet, they surround you. As you begin to drift away, they take you, down, deep into the depths, of your mind...



Welcome to the hauntingly surreal realm of My Shadow, a mesmerizing 2.5D Horror Puzzle Platformer that thrusts players into the enigmatic depths where reality and imagination intertwine. As the night descends, a mysterious world materializes, inviting you to embark on an otherworldly journey through the intricate labyrinth of your own mind.

Traverse the intricacies of the distorted dollhouse, solving puzzles that gradually unveil the truth about your innermost demons.
